旊字的基本解释

旊
fǎng
制瓦器：“土宜陶旊。”
中国周代制瓦器的工匠。

旊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǎng］
［《正字通》妃罔切］
(1)捏土制瓦器。
(2)指瓦器。

旊字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旊； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页483第16
【正字通】妃罔切，音倣。【周禮·冬官考工記】搏埴之工陶旊。【註】鄭司農云：讀爲甫始之甫。康成謂：讀如放於此乎之放。又【旊人】旊人爲簋。

旊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
旊字的起名意思

暂无。

旊
Basic explanation of words
旊
fǎng
Pottery: "The soil is suitable for pottery."
A craftsman who made pottery in the Zhou Dynasty of China.
旊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fǎng］
["Zhengzitong" concubine cuts out]
(1) Kneading earthen pottery.
(2) Refers to pottery.
旊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旊; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 483-16
【Zhengzitong】The concubine is cut and the sound is imitated. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji】Tao Yan, the master of fighting. [Note] Zheng Sinongyun: read as Fu Shizhi Fu. Kang Cheng said: Reading is like putting it here. Also【旊人】旊人为簋.
